name: Unreal Pinball
description:
Instructions   

Get the highest score in this Unreal re-telling of the classic pinball!

You have three lives!

Controls   

Left Ctrl/ Right Ctrl -  control left and right paddles, respectively.

Spacebar -controls the plunger

"<---   --->"  Left and Right  Arrow - Keys tilt the cabinet  

** Warning ** 

can only tilt three times!     There is no quit/esc button, you will have to alt-tab/ctrl-alt out of the game
